summary: This is an FBI 302 form documenting an interview with a female witness (name redacted) conducted on January 19, 2021. The witness describes her experiences as a minor providing massages to Jeffrey Epstein at his Palm Beach residence, detailing the roles of Ghislaine Maxwell and another associate in scheduling, payments, and attempts to recruit other young girls.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central subject of the investigation. The witness describes giving him massages, receiving money and gifts from him, and his requests for her to bring other young girls.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Acted as a scheduler and intermediary for Epstein, calling the witness to arrange massages, discussing recruitment of other girls, and being present during some of the witness's visits to Epstein's home.

persons.name: Sarah
persons.context: Another woman who called the witness to schedule massages with Epstein. She sometimes gave the witness money after the massages and was present during some interactions at Epstein's home.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Present during the FBI interview of the witness, first in person and later via phone.

persons.name: Detective
persons.context: Present via phone during the FBI interview of the witness.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: Present via phone during the FBI interview of the witness.

connections.description: Maxwell acted on Epstein's behalf to schedule massages with the witness, discussed recruiting other girls for him, and was present in his home.
Sarah called to schedule massages for Epstein and sometimes gave the witness payment on his behalf.
Both were involved in scheduling the witness for Epstein. The witness noted that over time, the scheduling calls switched from Maxwell to Sarah.
Maxwell recruited the underage witness for Epstein, asked for her measurements to send lingerie, offered extra money for removing clothing, and touched her breast on one occasion.
Epstein received massages from the underage witness, paid her, gave her gifts, and asked her to recruit other young girls.

events.title: Witness's Initial FBI Interview
events.description: The witness was previously interviewed by the FBI around 2006/2007, during which she provided the 'Massage for Dummies' book given to her by Epstein.

events.title: FBI Interview of Witness - Day 1
events.description: The FBI, along with an AUSA and a detective, conducted a detailed interview with a witness regarding her experiences with Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell when she was a minor.

events.title: Recruitment Attempt for Travel
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein separately asked the 14-year-old witness if she would travel with them, inquiring about a passport, despite knowing her age.

events.title: Photography Session with Sarah
events.description: Sarah called the witness (then about 15) to take photos of her at Epstein's house, told her to bring a swimsuit, and commented on her body.

keyFacts: The witness was 14 years old when she began giving massages to Jeffrey Epstein, and both Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell were aware of her age.
Ghislaine Maxwell offered the witness extra money ($100) to remove her bra during the massages and on one occasion touched the witness's breast while she was nude.
Epstein and Maxwell attempted to recruit the witness to find other younger girls for them, with Maxwell stating she could get extra money for doing so.
The witness received gifts from Epstein including Victoria's Secret lingerie, a 'Massage for Dummies' book, concert tickets, and flowers, often delivered to her home.
The witness admitted she did not disclose all details in her initial 2006/2007 FBI interview because she was scared and did not want to go to jail.
